verses.roman:
ei ādi-līlāra kaila sūtra gaṇana
vistāri varṇilā ihā dāsa vṛndāvana

synonyms: ei—this; ādi-līlara—of the ādi-līlā (the first portion of Lord Caitanya's pastimes); kaila—made; sūtra—synopsis; gaṇana—enumeration; vistāri—elaborately; varṇilā—described; ihā—this; dāsa vṛndāvana—Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura.
translation: Thus I have summarized the incidents of the ādi-līlā. Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura has described them elaborately [in his Caitanya-bhāgavata].
